title: Dead Space Remake NEXT YEAR? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.06.21
description:
Download the DoorDash app in the App Store and use code GAMES2021 or GAMESCA (if you’re in Canada) to get 25% off and free delivery on your first order!

Visit http://joinhoney.com/games to get Honey for free.

Greg and Tim talk about Jeffy Grubb Grubb's report that Dead Space is coming back next year, mad Pokemon fans, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:00 - Housekeeping
The Suicide Squad In Review is happening today! You can catch the live, ad-free recording on patreon.com/kindafunny at 3:15 pm PT, but it’ll be on YouTube and podcast services ASAP after that!
Thank you to our Patreon Producer Black Jack.
The Roper Report   -
00:06:41 - Dead Space Remake NEXT YEAR? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.06.21 Jeffy Grubb Grubb @ Gamesbeat
00:16:55 - Pokemon Go Responds to Angry Fans, Jared Moore @ IGN
00:24:33 - COD’s Among Us-like Mode, Austen Goslin @ Polygon
00:27:09 - Coke and State Farm Reassessing OWL Sponsorships, Teddy Amenabar @ Washington Post
Required Reading from Jason @ Bloomberg: Blizzard Turned Game Developers Into Rock Stars. Misbehavior Followed
https://www.bloomberg.com/news/features/2021-08-06/activision-blizzard-atvi-news-culture-of-misbehavior-festered-before-lawsuit
00:37:27 -  Ad
00:39:20 - PUBG’s New Name, Darryn @ GameSpot
00:43:00 - Evil Dead The Game Delayed
00:47:44 - TIDBIT: Streamline Media Group announced gaming industry veteran Shawn Layden has joined its Advisory Board. Layden will advise the company on its overall global strategy for video games and enterprise.
00:52:35 - Out today
00:53:40 - You‘re Wrong

TUE: Greg and Gary
WED: Blessing and
THURS: Blessing and Tim
